content:
Great! It seems there aren't any "MOCK IMPLEMENTATION" tags in the memory service file. Let's check one more thing to be thorough - let's look for any use of mock mode in the service files:

```bash
grep -n "use_mock" memory_service.py
grep -n "mock_" memory_service.py
```

Also, let's verify the GitHub workflow file we just created:

```bash
python3 workflow_verification.py --file .github/workflows/deploy.yml
```

This will help confirm we've addressed all the workflow issues identified earlier.
